info.author: Simon Pamies
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
------------

This package adds a new tab to ``portal_skins/custom`` folder named "FS-Export". 
Using this tab you can export all scripts and other stuff you have customized
with one click to the filesystem. Now also with support for
portal_view_customizations folder.

Even in times of views, content providers and viewlets there are cases where
you have stuff in custom folder and struggle with exporting it to the
filesystem. 

Installation
------------

- Extend your buildout with anthill.customexport
- Make sure your instance knows about it (eggs=, zcml=)
- Rerun buildout
- Go to portal_skins/custom and then click on the new tab

Tested with
-----------

Plone 2.5.x and 3.x

Changelog
=========

0.3 - 2010-11-30
----------------

- Fixed exporter for Plone 4 environments
  [spamsch]

0.2 - 2009-09-01
----------------

* Fixed code to make export from portal_view_customiztions possible [spamsch]

0.1 - 2009-08-14
----------------

* Initial release after repackaging
info.keywords: zope patch customfolder skinning theme skin plone
info.name: anthill.customexport
info.summary: Makes it possible to export custom folder contents (from portal_skins/custom and portal_view_customizations) to filesystem
info.html_description:
Introduction

This package adds a new tab to portal_skins/custom folder named “FS-Export”. Using this tab you can export all scripts and other stuff you have customized with one click to the filesystem. Now also with support for portal_view_customizations folder.

Even in times of views, content providers and viewlets there are cases where you have stuff in custom folder and struggle with exporting it to the filesystem.

Installation

  • Extend your buildout with anthill.customexport
  • Make sure your instance knows about it (eggs=, zcml=)
  • Rerun buildout
  • Go to portal_skins/custom and then click on the new tab

Tested with

Plone 2.5.x and 3.x

Changelog

0.3 - 2010-11-30

  • Fixed exporter for Plone 4 environments [spamsch]

0.2 - 2009-09-01

  • Fixed code to make export from portal_view_customiztions possible [spamsch]

0.1 - 2009-08-14

  • Initial release after repackaging
